code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Users from'./Users';import{changePage,setUsersThunk,followThunk,unfollowThunk}from'../../redux/users-reducer';import{connect}from'react-redux';import preloader from'../../assets/img/preloader.gif';import s from'./Users.module.css';import{compose}from'redux';import withRedirect from'../hoc/withRedirect';var UsersContainer=function UsersContainer(props){useEffect(function(){props.setUsersThunk(props.trueUsersCount,props.activePage);},[props.activePage]);if(props.isLoaded===false)return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{className:s.img,src:preloader,alt:""});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Users,props);};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{users:state.usersPage.users,trueUsersCount:state.usersPage.trueUsersCount,activePage:state.usersPage.activePage,usersCount:state.usersPage.usersCount,isLoaded:state.usersPage.isLoaded,isDisabled:state.usersPage.isDisabled};};export default compose(connect(mapStateToProps,{changePage:changePage,followThunk:followThunk,unfollowThunk:unfollowThunk,setUsersThunk:setUsersThunk}),withRedirect)(UsersContainer);
